jcr:content.jcr:title: Mechanical Switches
jcr:content.searchTitle: Advanced Mechanical Key Switches for Gaming
jcr:content.seoDescription: Discover Romer G mechanical switches for Logitech G gaming keyboards. Find the right switch and click type for how you play.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G Advanced Mechanical Key Switches for Gaming

banner_copy_copy.altText: Zoomed view of mechanical key switch

copyblock.mainDescription: Designed for peak performance Logitech G offers different options to suit your play style and preference. Logitech G keyboards deliver performance, quality and reliability—and are the choice of some of the world's top esports athletes.
copyblock.subTitle: Advanced Gaming Switches

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: Using only 2 AA batteries, G613 can be used for up to 18 months. When battery is at 15%, both the LED status indicator light on the keyboard and Logitech Gaming Software notifications will warn you before the critical moment hits. Battery life may vary based on your usage and computing conditions.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription:
Logitech G offers different types of mechanical switches, each delivering a distinct experience.
The Romer-G gaming switches are designed with a short 1.5 mm travel distance, a centered backlight, and quieter performance. Romer-G is available in two variations: Tactile and Linear.
For those that prefer a classic experience, the GX Blue gaming switches deliver an iconic actuation you can hear and feel.

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: Finding the right option is all about the experience you prefer.

html.text:
Romer-G
Tactile

Romer-G Tactile, the original profile, provides a discernible tactile bump during actuation.

Our tactile actuation is minimal and so provides confidence and precision in the actuation moment, without being too loud or distracting. Romer-G Tactile is ideal for competitive and FPS gaming.

Force
55gf
45gf
Total Distance
1.5mm
3.2mm
Tactile
Point
Operating
Point

Romer-G
Linear

Romer-G Linear provides a fluid and smooth keystroke.

Linear actuation is great for double-tapping, rapid keystrokes in succession and uninterrupted half-presses. Romer-G Linear is ideal for MMO and action games.

Force
45gf
Total Distance
1.5mm
3.2mm
Operating
Point

GX Blue

The GX Blue is an iconic mechanical switch that provides an unmistakable click when pressed.

GX Blue delivers audible and tactile feedback just like the common, traditional switches gamers are used to. They’re ideal for those looking for the familiar “clicky” switch.

Force
60gf
50gf
Total Distance
1.9mm
4mm

media_tile_copy_copy_563726737.text: Built to last 70 million keystrokes, Romer-G and GX Blue mechanical switches are up to 40% more durable than the standard mechanical switches.Compared to 50 million keystrokes in standard mechanical switches Both Romer-G and GX Blue switches undergo intense testing and are held to the same high standard to ensure quality and reliability.

media_tile_copy_copy_529875473.altText: Romer-G Mechanical Switch: 5 ms actuation time, standard mechanical switch: 6.7 ms actuation time
media_tile_copy_copy_529875473.text: Mechanical key switches are not only more durable but also faster and more consistent for a superior keystroke experience compared to common membrane keyboards. Mechanical switches respond with auditory and sensory feedback during actuation to immediately signal the keystroke completion. Logitech G offers three distinct key switches: Romer-G Tactile, Romer-G Linear, and GX Blue for a variety of fast actuation options.

media_tile_copy_copy_1258434574.text: Esports professionals all over the world prefer Logitech G mechanical keyboards for their speed, consistency, and reliability.
